text: Edward ("Ed") Ofili (born 20 September 1957) is a Nigerian former sprinter who competed in the 1970s and specialized in 100 metres and 200 metres events. He was an Olympian, competing for Nigeria in 1976, and ran collegiate track and field for the University of Missouri https://mutigers.com/sports/2016/6/8/mizzou-olympians.aspx He won a gold medal in 200 metres at the inaugural 1979 African Championships in Athletics. ==Achievements== {| |- |rowspan=2|1979 |rowspan=2|African Championships in Athletics |rowspan=2|Dakar, Senegal |bgcolor=cc9966|3rd |100 m |10.66 |- |bgcolor=gold|1st |200 m |20.90 |- |} ==References== ==External links== *Edward Ofili profile at All-Athletics.com Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Nigerian male sprinters
title: Edward Ofili
